summary: AN ORDINANCE related to public works, concentration banking services, and the purchase of goods and services governed by SMC 3.18.800 and provided by firms which have significant direct investments in Burma.
vote: 4-5 (On motion to pass: Yes: Licata, McIver, Steinbrueck, Conlin; No: Pageler, Choe, Donaldson, Podlodowski, Drago)
